summary: Henry and Fay's son Ned sets out to find and kill his father for destroying his mother's life. But his aims are frustrated by the troublesome Susan, whose connection to Henry predates even his arrival in the lives of the Rifle family.
cast: Parker Posey|Aubrey Plaza|Liam Aiken|Robert John Burke|Martin Donovan|James Urbaniak|Bill Sage|Quincy Tyler Bernstine|Gia Crovatin|Karen Sillas|Lloyd Kaufman|Jefferson Mays|Christina Rouner|John Ellison Conlee|Thomas Jay Ryan|Bob Byington|Lindsay Rootare|Johnny M. Wu|Claire Jamison|Michael Wren Gucciardo|Paul Boocock|Jordan Theodore|Tanya Perez|Tymon Brown|Jennifer Seastone|Marc Damon Johnson|Melissa Bithorn|Ella Steinbeck|Andrew Weems|Caleb Hammond|Angelo Lozada|Penelope Lagos|Hannah Vaughn|Brandon Morrissey|Megan Hartig|Jed Feiman
title: Ned Rifle
